      • filterOutOrigin

        public static com.typesafe.config.Config filterOutOrigin(com.typesafe.config.Config config,
                                                         java.lang.String originFile)
        This util can be used to filter out configuration from specific origin

        For example, if you want to filter out configuration from reference.conf Then you can use like this:

        filterOutOrigin(config, "reference.conf")

        Parameters:
        config - (undocumented)
        originFile - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
